name: Super CTF
description:
Super CTF is fast paced multiplayer capture the flag with weapons and abilities.

You can compete with or against your friends to climb the ranked leaderboards in match sizes of 2 - 10 players.

The game is frequently being updated with new additions to switch up the meta and keep things balanced - if you want to get involved or make suggestions come join our discord!

Our discord is for players who want to compete in events, get involved in suggestions for new updates, or just to hang out: https://discord.gg/32gaJvt

Also the game can be played at https://www.superctf.com rather than itch.io if you prefer.
